title: ConvertXtoDVD 5.2.0.12 [BETA] + Patch [SWEG]
description:
Includes the VSO ConvertXtoDVD v5.2.0.12 BETA installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. No serial number required. Done! Enjoy!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------



Convert videos to DVD and watch on any DVD player. Automatically burn to DVD after conversion. Excellent and fast converter. Convert AVI, MKV, MOV, Divx, WMV, MTS/M2TS, MPG, MP4 and more to DVD. Create menus & chapters, cut videos, total customization with live preview.


Edit your project with the various settings and features listed below:

  -Create menus with videos and music
  -Preview window / Integrated video player for live preview
  -Cut unwanted parts of the video
  -Add chapters - automatic or custom
  -Many subtitles formats supported, convert soft or hard-coded
  -Convert NTSC to PAL and vice-versa
  -Merge function - like for CD1 + CD2
  -Rotate video, modify brightness and contrast settings
  -Compatible with any disks
  -ISO output available
  -NTSC + PAL region formats
  -16:9 widescreen + 4:3 fullscreen
  -Burn multiple copies
  -VSO burning engine included
  -Various SD resolutions available
  -Custom output size
  -Burn to DVD/USB key or store on PC

Additional/Advanced features:

  -2 pass encoding for enhanced quality
  -Hardware decoding for faster conversion
  -Video/Audio/Subtitle synchronisation
  -Various audio output formats
  -Image resize filters (lanczos, linear, cubic, etc.)
  -Multiple encoding profiles
  -Option to shutdown computer when finished
  -Multi-core processor optimized
  -Audio amplifier
  -Padding and cropping
  -De-interlacing
  -Batch converter
  -Multiple conversions processed simultaneously
  -Quality advisor

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY UPGRADE?

- 0008342: [Bug] error when closing application, AV and Exception EOSError (cedric) - resolved.
- 0008369: [Bug] original chapters not used for conversion if chapter tab under preview not displayed (cedric) - resolved.
- 0008190: [Information] the way a title set appears when conversion is complete is no longer boxed as it used to be (felicia) - resolved.
- 0008180: [Information] no progress bar in menu thumbnail when converting menu like in previous version (cedric) - resolved.
- 0008307: [Bug] overlapping problem of abreviated titleset name and x icon to remove titleset (felicia) - resolved.
- 0008236: [Bug] Access violation when moving the treeview display slider during a conversion with particular theme (felicia) - resolved.
- 0008158: [Bug] no hint on slider (treeview display minimal or thumbnail view) (felicia) - resolved.
- 0007313: [Bug] strings not in translation (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007314: [Bug] can't rename chapters for menu display text (cedric) - resolved.
- 0006297: [Bug] does not detect badly entered license key (cedric) - resolved.
- 0005756: [Bug] wrong hint text when adding subtitle to titleset (felicia) - resolved.
- 0007935: [Bug] menu corrections (felicia) - resolved.
- 0007656: [Bug] menu: reduce the text - is not working (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006326: [Bug] warning text too long when blank space is used for disc name (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006351: [Bug] warning missing for menu text too long (felicia) - resolved.
